named-query.name: selectAllUsers
named-query.query: select u from User u order by u.name

named-query.name: selectUserByNameAndPassword
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.name = :name and u.password = :password

named-query.name: selectUserByName
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.name = :name order by u.name

named-query.name: selectUserByPermission
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.permission = :permission order by u.name

named-query.name: selectUserByNameOrPermission
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.name = :name or u.permission = :permission order by u.name

named-query.name: deleteUser
named-query.query: delete User u where u.name = :name

named-query.name: selectAllProducts
named-query.query: select p from Product p order by p.description

named-query.name: selectProductByCode
named-query.query: select p from Product p where p.code = :code

named-query.name: selectProductByDescription
named-query.query: select p from Product p where p.description like :description order by p.description

named-query.name: selectProductByCodeOrDescription
named-query.query: select p from Product p where p.code = :code or p.description like :description order by p.description

named-query.name: updateProduct
named-query.query: update Product p set p.description = :description, p.price = :price where p.code = :code

named-query.name: deleteProduct
named-query.query: delete from Product p where p.code = :code

named-query.name: selectAllClients
named-query.query: select c from Client c order by c.name

named-query.name: selectClientByName
named-query.query: select c from Client c where c.name like :name order by c.name

named-query.name: selectClientByCPF
named-query.query: select c from Client c where c.cpf = :cpf order by c.name

named-query.name: selectClientByNameOrCPF
named-query.query: select c from Client c where c.name like :name or c.cpf = :cpf order by c.name

named-query.name: selectClientByCode
named-query.query: select c from Client c where c.code = :code order by c.name

named-query.name: updateClient
named-query.query: update Client c set c.name = :name, c.cpf = :cpf, c.phone = :phone, c.email = :email, c.address = :address, c.number = :number, c.city = :city, c.uf = :uf where c.code = :code

named-query.name: deleteClient
named-query.query: delete from Client c where c.code = :code

named-query.name: selectAllStock
named-query.query: select s from Stock s order by s.product

named-query.name: selectStockByCode
named-query.query: select s from Stock s join s.product p where p.code = :code order by p.description

named-query.name: selectStockByDescription
named-query.query: select s from Stock s join s.product p where p.description like :description order by p.description

named-query.name: selectStockByCodeOrDescription
named-query.query: select s from Stock s join s.product p where p.code = :code or p.description like :description order by p.description

named-query.name: selectStockByProductCode
named-query.query: select s from Stock s where s.product = :product

named-query.name: addToStock
named-query.query: update Stock s set s.quantity = (s.quantity + :quantity) where s.code = :code

named-query.name: withdrawStock
named-query.query: update Stock s set s.quantity = (s.quantity - :quantity) where s.code = :code

named-query.name: adjustStock
named-query.query: update Stock s set s.quantity = :quantity where s.code = :code

named-query.name: deleteStock
named-query.query: delete from Stock s where s.code = :code

named-query.name: selectAllSales
named-query.query: select s from Sale s order by s.date

named-query.name: selectSalesByDate
named-query.query: select s from Sale s where date(date) = :date order by s.date

named-query.name: selectAllAcquisitions
named-query.query: select a from Acquisition a order by a.date

named-query.name: selectAcquisitionByDate
named-query.query: select a from Acquisition a where date(a.date) = :date order by a.date

named-query.name: selectItemBySaleCode
named-query.query: select i from Item i join i.sale s where s.code = :saleCode

named-native-query.name: selectOperationsPerDay
named-native-query.query: select date(o.date) timestamp, sum((select o1.value from Operation o1 where o1.code = o.code and o1.type = 'S')) valueSale, sum((select o2.value from Operation o2 where o2.code = o.code and o2.type = 'A')) valueAcquisition from Operation o group by date(o.date)

named-native-query.name: selectOperationsPerDayByDate
named-native-query.query: select date(o.date) timestamp, sum((select o1.value from Operation o1 where o1.code = o.code and o1.type = 'S')) valueSale, sum((select o2.value from Operation o2 where o2.code = o.code and o2.type = 'A')) valueAcquisition from Operation o where date(o.date) = :date group by date(o.date)

named-native-query.name: selectOperationsPerMonth
named-native-query.query: select date(o.date) timestamp, sum((select o1.value from Operation o1 where o1.code = o.code and o1.type = 'S')) valueSale, sum((select o2.value from Operation o2 where o2.code = o.code and o2.type = 'A')) valueAcquisition from Operation o group by month(o.date)

named-native-query.name: selectOperationsPerMonthByMonth
named-native-query.query: select date(o.date) timestamp, sum((select o1.value from Operation o1 where o1.code = o.code and o1.type = 'S')) valueSale, sum((select o2.value from Operation o2 where o2.code = o.code and o2.type = 'A')) valueAcquisition from Operation o where month(o.date) = month(:date) and year(o.date) = year(:date) group by month(o.date)

named-native-query.name: selectOperationsPerYear
named-native-query.query: select date(o.date) timestamp, sum((select o1.value from Operation o1 where o1.code = o.code and o1.type = 'S')) valueSale, sum((select o2.value from Operation o2 where o2.code = o.code and o2.type = 'A')) valueAcquisition from Operation o group by year(o.date)

named-native-query.name: selectOperationsPerYearByYear
named-native-query.query: select date(o.date) timestamp, sum((select o1.value from Operation o1 where o1.code = o.code and o1.type = 'S')) valueSale, sum((select o2.value from Operation o2 where o2.code = o.code and o2.type = 'A')) valueAcquisition from Operation o where year(o.date) = year(:date) group by year(o.date)
